name: SP Marketplace
description:
SP Marketplace (SharePoint Marketplace) is a developer of software applications that create higher organizational productivity using Microsoft SharePoint. SP Marketplace offers application templates, web parts and branding solutions designed for SharePoint on-premise and Office 365 Cloud implementations. SP Business Suite includes an Intranet Portal, Employee Self-Service, HR, CRM, Projects and IT Portals.
SP Marketplace’s unique “Application Provisioning” approach offers a cost effective business solution approach for small to medium businesses who wish to use the Microsoft SharePoint 2010 and 2013 platforms.
READ MORE...
